title: Tekkaman Blade 2 (Dub)
alternative_title: 宇宙の騎士テッカマンブレード II
description: 10 years have passed since the end of the last war against the radam. A new team of Space Knights has been assembled under the lead of Aki and D-boy. The first mission of the new tekkaman is to defeat the radam but then, they have to fight against a remnent from the past.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Military>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>, <Genre -> Space>]
